author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shield Therapeutics Says Top-Line Results From Aegis-Ckd Pivotal Phase III Study Of Feraccru​
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Shield Therapeutics Plc:
* ‍ANNOUNCES TOP-LINE RESULTS FROM ITS AEGIS-CKD PIVOTAL PHASE III STUDY OF FERACCRU​
* ‍PRIMARY EFFICACY ENDPOINT NOT ACHIEVED​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
